page.title: 20RUNCORN CONCLUDING COMMENTS
page.content: In studying the area,we have covered a variety of aspects,chosen both because of their importance in the locality and in accordance with the personal interests of the participating schools. In researching this project,we have discovered many things about our surroundings that would otherwise have remained unknown to us.We hope our findings will be of value to anyone who consults the disc in the future. The statistics,text and photographs were compiled by the staff and pupils of the following Runcorn Primary schools,during June and July 1985 {Grange Junior School {Halton Lodge Junior School {The Park Primary School {St. Augustines R.C. Primary School {Woodside Primary School.
